articles.title: Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs accuses drinks giant Diageo of racism in US lawsuit - The Guardian
articles.description: Rapper and producer says company undermined joint venture by marketing key products Ciroc and DeLeon as ‘Black brands’
articles.content:
The US rapper, producer and entrepreneur Sean Combs has sued the spirits giant Diageo, accusing the British multinational of racism, and of deliberately undermining a joint-venture spirits brand.
